languages.text: {n}Увы, стражи не были искусны в расстановке ловушек, и долго врагу удавалось обходить их. Наконец однажды взрыв возвестил, что зверь попался. Раненую тварь удалось обнаружить и обратить в бегство.{/n}

{n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, стражи не были искусны в расстановке ловушек, и долго врагу удавалось обходить их. Наконец однажды взрыв возвестил, что зверь попался. Раненую тварь удалось обнаружить и обратить в бегство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the overseers' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

{n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

{n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，看守们并不擅长设置陷阱，在很长一段时间里，狡猾的敌人都躲开了陷阱。但到了最后，爆炸声终于响了起来——猎物终于踩到了陷阱。在这之后，看守发现了那只受伤的生物，将其赶走了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，看守们并不擅长设置陷阱，在很长一段时间里，狡猾的敌人都躲开了陷阱。但到了最后，爆炸声终于响了起来——猎物终于踩到了陷阱。在这之后，看守发现了那只受伤的生物，将其赶走了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por desgracia, los alcaides no tenían talento como tramperos y, durante mucho tiempo, no obtuvieron ningún resultado. Al fin, una explosión indicó que la bestia había sido capturada. La criatura herida fue entonces descubierta y espantada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por desgracia, los alcaides no tenían talento como tramperos y, durante mucho tiempo, no obtuvieron ningún resultado. Al fin, una explosión indicó que la bestia había sido capturada. La criatura herida fue entonces descubierta y espantada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、罠を仕掛けるのは監督者の能力には含まれていないうえ、ずっと長い間、奴らはなんとか罠を避けることができるようになった。しかし、やがて爆発が起こり、獣が捕まったことを知らせた。すると、傷ついた生物が発見され、撃退された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、罠を仕掛けるのは監督者の能力には含まれていないうえ、ずっと長い間、奴らはなんとか罠を避けることができるようになった。しかし、やがて爆発が起こり、獣が捕まったことを知らせた。すると、傷ついた生物が発見され、撃退された。{/n}
{n}しかし、罠を仕掛けるのは監督者の能力には含まれていないうえ、ずっと長い間、奴らはなんとか罠を避けることができるようになった。しかし、やがて爆発が起こり、獣が捕まったことを知らせた。すると、傷ついた生物が発見され、撃退された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hélas, poser des pièges n'est pas le fort de ces gardiens et, pendant une période qui semble interminable, le monstre parvient à les éviter. Puis, un jour, une explosion signale enfin sa présence, le blessant et permettant de le repousser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hélas, poser des pièges n'est pas le fort de ces gardiens et, pendant une période qui semble interminable, le monstre parvient à les éviter. Puis, un jour, une explosion signale enfin sa présence, le blessant et permettant de le repousser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Wächter der Kolonie waren keine sonderlich geschickten Fallensteller, und der Feind konnte ihnen lange entgehen. Schließlich aber verkündete eine Explosion, dass das Monster gefangen worden war. Die verwundete Kreatur wurde entdeckt und vertrieben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wächter der Kolonie waren keine sonderlich geschickten Fallensteller, und der Feind konnte ihnen lange entgehen. Schließlich aber verkündete eine Explosion, dass das Monster gefangen worden war. Die verwundete Kreatur wurde entdeckt und vertrieben.{/n}

{n}Die Aufseher der Kolonie waren keine sonderlich geschickten Fallensteller, und der Feind konnte ihnen lange entgehen. Schließlich aber verkündete eine Explosion, dass das Monster gefangen worden war. Die verwundete Kreatur wurde entdeckt und vertrieben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maalesef müdürlerin becerileri arasında tuzak kurmak yoktu. Bu sebeple düşman, uzunca bir müddet onlardan kaçınabildi. Ama sonunda bir patlama duyuldu ve canavarın yakalandığı anlaşıldı. Sonrasında yaralı mahluk bulundu ve defedildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, setting traps was not one of the wardens' talents, and for the longest time, the enemy managed to avoid them. Eventually, however, an explosion signalled that the beast had been caught. The wounded creature was then discovered and driven off.{/n}
